Field.Name: FormDEmergencyResponsePlan312
Field.PromptText: ICS-208-CG SSP-L: HAZWOPER 1910.120 Drum Compliance Checklist

Field.Name: DrumsmeetDOTOSHAEPAregsforwastetheycontainincludingshipment
Field.PromptText: Drums meet DOT, OSHA, EPA regs for waste they contain, including shipment?

Field.Name: Drumsinspectedandintegrityensuredpriortomovement
Field.PromptText: Drums inspected and integrity ensured prior to movement?

Field.Name: Ordrumsmovedtoanaccessiblelocationstagingareapriortomovement
Field.PromptText: Or drums moved to an accessible location (staging area) prior to movement?

Field.Name: Unlabelleddrumstreatedasunknownuntilproperlyidentifiedandlabeled
Field.PromptText: Unlabelled drums treated as unknown until properly identified and labeled?

Field.Name: Siteactivitiesorganizedtominimizedrumhandling
Field.PromptText: Site activities organized to minimize drum handling?

Field.Name: Employersproperlywarnedaboutthehazardsofmovingandhandlingdrums
Field.PromptText: Employers properly warned about the hazards of moving and handling drums?

Field.Name: Suitableoverpackdrumsareavailableforaddressingleakingandruptured
Field.PromptText: Suitable overpack drums are available for addressing leaking and ruptured drums?

Field.Name: Leakingmaterialsfromdrumsproperlycontained
Field.PromptText: Leaking materials from drums properly contained?

Field.Name: Aredrumsthatcannotbemovedemptiedofcontentswithtransferequipment
Field.PromptText: Are drums that cannot be moved, emptied of contents with transfer equipment?

Field.Name: Aresuspectburieddrumssurveyedwithundergrounddetectionsystem
Field.PromptText: Are suspect buried drums surveyed with underground detection system?

Field.Name: Aresoilandcoveringmaterialaboveburieddrumsremovedwithcaution
Field.PromptText: Are soil and covering material above buried drums removed with caution?

Field.Name: Istheproperextinguishingequipmentonscenetocontrolincipientfires
Field.PromptText: Is the proper extinguishing equipment on scene to control incipient fires?

Field.Name: Areairlinesonsuppliedairsystemsprotectedfromleakingdrums
Field.PromptText: Are airlines on supplied air systems protected from leaking drums?

Field.Name: Areemployeesatasafedistanceusingremoteequipmentwhenhandlingexplo
Field.PromptText: Are employees at a safe distance, using remote equipment, when handling explosive drums?

Field.Name: Areexplosiveshieldsinplanetoprotectworkersopeningexplosivedrums
Field.PromptText: Are explosive shields in plane to protect workers opening explosive drums?

Field.Name: Isresponseequipmentpositionedbehindshieldswhenshieldsareused
Field.PromptText: Is response equipment positioned behind shields when shields are used?

Field.Name: Arenonsparkingtoolsusedinflammableorpotentiallyflammableatmosphe
Field.PromptText: Are non-sparking tools used in flammable or potentially flammable atmospheres?

Field.Name: Aredrumsunderextremepressureopenedslowlyworkersprotectedbyshield
Field.PromptText: Are drums under extreme pressure opened slowly & workers protected by shields/distance?

Field.Name: Areworkersprohibitedfromstandingandworkingondrums
Field.PromptText: Are workers prohibited from standing and working on drums?

Field.Name: Isthedrumhandlingequipmentpositionedandoperatedtominimizesources
Field.PromptText: Is the drum handling equipment positioned and operated to minimize sources of ignition?

Field.Name: Forshocksensitivedrumshaveallnonessentialemployeesbeenevacuated
Field.PromptText: For shock sensitive drums, have all non-essential employees been evacuated?

Field.Name: Forshocksensitivedrumsishandlingequipmentprovidedwithshieldstopr
Field.PromptText: For shock sensitive drums: is handling equipment provided with shields to protect workers?

Field.Name: FormDEmergencyResponsePlan3121
Field.PromptText: ICS-208-CG SSP-L: HAZWOPER 1910.120 Drum Compliance Checklist (cont.)

Field.Name: Arealarmsthatannouncestartfinishofexplosivedrumhandlingactionsin
Field.PromptText: Are alarms that announce start/finish of explosive drum handling actions in place?

Field.Name: Arecontinuouscommunicationsinplacebetweenthedrumhandlingsitecomm
Field.PromptText: Are continuous communications in place between the drum handling site & command post?

Field.Name: Aredrumsunderpressureproperlycontrolledforpriortohandling
Field.PromptText: Are drums under pressure properly controlled for prior to handling?

Field.Name: Aredrumscontainingpackagedlaboratorywastestreatedasshocksensitiv
Field.PromptText: Are drums containing packaged laboratory wastes treated as shock sensitive?

Field.Name: Arelabpacksopenedbytrainedandexperiencedpersonnel
Field.PromptText: Are lab packs opened by trained and experienced personnel?

Field.Name: Arelabpacksshowingcrystallizationtreatedasshocksensitive
Field.PromptText: Are lab packs showing crystallization treated as shock sensitive?

Field.Name: Aredrumstagingareasmanageablewithmarkedaccessandegress
Field.PromptText: Are drum staging areas manageable with marked access and egress?

Field.Name: Isbulkingofdrumsconductedonlyafterdrumcontentshavebeenproperlyid
Field.PromptText: Is bulking of drums conducted only after drum contents have been properly identified?
